text: The Kamchatka Peninsula (, poluostrov Kamchatka) is a peninsula in eastern Russia. It is long and covers about Быкасов В. Е. Ошибка в географии // Известия Всесоюзного Географического Общества. — 1991. — № 6. between the Pacific Ocean and the Sea of Okhotsk. Kamchatka has the Volcanoes of Kamchatka, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. ==References== == Sources == *. *Kamchatka in Full Circle with Michael Pailin.
